items.sentence: You don't seem to be in as much of a hurry as you usually are.
The gardener said that mineral fertilizers are more effective.
Tom is thinking about selling his motorcycle and buying a car.
Tom gets himself in trouble because he says yes to everything.
Children generally have a higher body temperature than adults.
Tom is the only person in our office who doesn't speak French.
How are badminton and tennis different? How are they the same?
What's the main difference between a motorcycle and a bicycle?
Tom texted Mary to let her know that he had arrived in Boston.
I don't like hot weather, so this heat's really getting to me.
